messages.title: Beware of Conservative dirty tricks
messages.content: With the election drawing nearer, it's clear that the Conservatives are turning to their regular negative campaign tactics and trying to con voters.

messages.title: BEWARE!
messages.content: Don't be conned by the Conservatives...

mentions.tacticalSituation: In many parts of the country, there are no Labour MPs to vote out. In those areas, the choice is between the Lib Dems and the Conservatives.

quotes.text: Tories are at the centre of a dirty tricks row...
...it looks as if the Tories couldn't resist playing dirty...

leaflet.additionalNotes: Only the Liberal Democrats will deliver real change and a fairer Britain.
